alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 8:29PM CDT until July 21 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Barbour County in southeastern Alabama... Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Columbus to Seale to near Hurtsboro, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eufaula, Hurtsboro, Hawkinsville, Russell County Sports Complex, Spring Hill, Seale, Lakepoint Resort State Park, Twin Springs, Rutherford, Lugo, Hatchechubbe, Uchee Creek, Fort Mitchell and Fort Mitchell Activity Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
